title: Pharmacy Management System
description: Pharmacy Management System is a simple application which can be used to improve the maintenance and manipulation of the drugs in the medicals.
It is a user-friendly application and will be used to minimize the time and resource by maintaining the details of the drug systemically so that the data can be used in possible quickest time.

title: Course Companion
description: CourseCompanion is a course tracker that tracks a series of recorded lectures and assists students.

It provides functionalities such as: 
1. Ability to upload recorded lectures 
2. Streaming of recorded lectures

title: Musica
description: Social media platform for Artists and Music.
This platform will allow artists to interact and claborate.
They can upload their own music or lyrics

title: Movie Recommender System
description: A platform on which the users can rate different movies.
And they will get recommendation on the basis of their rating.

title: Restaurant Page
description: Simple static website for a chinese restaurant
This page which will allow user to check the updated menu and contact the resturant

title: LearnIt API
description: LearnIt is all about organizing, managing the classroom oriented tasks.
It also involves maintaining the database of students, teachers and the classes.
